text:
I’m told the White House coronavirus Task Force has two estimates being used now: 
Optimistic scenario: Peak virus will come 1 month from Saturday March 14. Pessimistic scenario: peak virus 3 months from March 14.

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice
